tool_description: Generates professional color palettes for resume design based on industry standards and template requirements.

industry.description: Target industry for color scheme appropriateness

template_name.description: Template name to align color scheme with

color_preference.description: Color preference: conservative, vibrant, or neutral

accent_color.description: Preferred accent color (hex code or color name)

error_messages: Empty industry field: Provide a specific industry name for appropriate color selection.
Invalid template name: Provide a valid template name from previous recommendations.
Invalid color preference: Use one of [conservative, vibrant, neutral].
Invalid accent color format: Provide hex code (e.g., #FF5733) or standard color name.
usage: Specify industry and template name, optionally provide color preference and accent color. The tool generates a coordinated color palette with usage guidelines.

primary_color.description: Primary color for headers and accents

usage_guidelines.description: Guidelines for applying the color scheme
